head: 1bed 1bath for rent
post: Hello, We are renting out our extra bedroom in our 2bed 2bath apartment. Yes, you will have YOUR OWN bathroom. Yes, we have a washer & dryer you will have all access to whenever. & yes you will have all kitchen privileges. You may be a single, couple or even a little family. We have a 3 year old daughter so have to be okay with kids. We need someone who is responsible & that will pay rent on time. Rent is 750$ & a 400 deposit. Rent includes utilities. & deposit can be discussed. We live at the Montelena apartments in Hayward. But it is now called the Metro 655. You may call or text at 5106008472 or email. Thank you. Have a good day.

head: marvelous 1 bedroom iin noe valley
post: This charming, spacious 1 bedroom has a living room and eat-in kitchen. Brand new remodeled kitchen with granite countertops, maple cabinets and Hardwood floor. New stainless steel dishwasher, stove with oven, and side-by-side fridge. Features:  Fully furnished with couch, desk, bookcases, queen bed and mattress, tv stand, coffee table, nightstand, hardwood kitchen table and chairs  Brand new mattress  Full kitchen with dishwasher, granite countertops, 4 gas burner stainless steel range with convection oven, wine rack  Free private washer and dryer in unit  Hardwood flooring, crown molding, stained glass accents  Plenty of maple built in cabinetry, closet, and shelf storage  Utilities included  Bright and sunny

head: Modern Estate Home With AuPair Quarter
post: SOCIAL MEDIA LINKS Lumi Worldwide Photo Gallery Description As the security gate opens and you drive into a spacious courtyard you realize this is truly a piece of Real Estate art; form and function working together. As you walk past the 3 car garage doors made of Honduras-Philippine Mahogany to the front door you will be amazed that the wall next to it is made of glass bricks. This is just the start of the many surprises in store for you. When you walk around the exterior of the first floor of this 3 story 5880 sq ft home, you will be delighted to discover the large rock garden with your very own waterfall and the spacious patio area that transitions into an extremely large, curved deck winding around the rear the home. It quickly becomes apparent that this home has privacy in a natural setting that includes mature oak, redwood, countless fruit trees, and your own hidden bocce ball court, and yet you are only 5 minutes away from both the freeway and downtown Santa Rosa. All this plus a 280 degree unobstructed view that seems to go on forever....especially at night when you cant tell where the valley lights end and the stars begin. When entering this home, its obvious that no expense was spared on the quality of fixtures and amenities, whether it be the indoor built-in BBQ pit, the elevator to all 3 floors plus two 2 spiral staircases, multiple fireplaces, zone controlled and energy efficient design throughout, pre-wiring for your own sound system, walk-in pantry, fire sprinkler system, or the Honduras/Philippine-Mahogany ceiling and floor - and, did we mention you have your very own indoor/outdoor herb garden next to the kitchen? On the subject of the kitchen, it has seen many successful professional cooking demonstrations, which tells you that If you cant cook it here...it cant be cooked. Throughout the remaining rooms of the main floor the light pours through floor to ceiling windows whether its in the dining room, family room, and breakfast area, emphasizing the openness of this unique floor plan. Whether taking the spiral stairs or the elevator to the upper floor, a crystal chandelier will light your way to the 3 master bedrooms with endless views, and private balconies, and all with their own master baths. This floor also provides the added luxury of your very own Jacuzzi and sauna. A special bonus of this 3 story home is the lower level where you will find totally independent living quarters for guests, family, or home staff. This includes an oversize living room, its own deck, bedroom, kitchen, full bathroom, laundry room, and its own entryway for total privacy. For those who especially love the outdoors and pets the home also has a 20FT fenced dog run with an automatic watering system.   Features Bedrooms: 4 Bathrooms: 6 Parking Spaces: 3 Square Footage: 5,620 Agent Name: Accolade Management Broker: Accolade Inc Location Chaparral Ct Santa Rosa CA 95409 Created with vFlyer Marketing vFlyer Id: 204733035

head: ★♦♥Updated 3Bd/2Bth Livermore Home☻♥♦
post: $2,450 per month, 3 bedrooms, 2 full baths, 0 half baths. Avail mid-July. Open house by appointment only. | (408) 320-6446 Meadowlark St, Livermore, CA 3BR/2BA Single Family House $2,450/month Bedrooms 3 Bathrooms 2 full, 0 partial Parking 3+ dedicated Pet Policy Cats, Dogs (under 25lbs) Deposit $2,500 DESCRIPTION Fine house, with clean aesthetic, modern, and fresh with an unexpected attention to detail. This is a must-see. New interior and exterior paint colors have been cohesively coordinated. Hardwood floors throughout the house, with new tile in kitchen. The maple wood kitchen cabinets have been matched with KovastoneŽ quartz countertop. Master and hall baths have been completely remodeled. Silent glide cabinets with luxurious carrera marble was used on the new hall bath vanity. A blend of modern, polished chrome bath fixtures and oil-rubbed bronze hardware fixtures are used throughout the house. Front and rear yards feature expansive new lawns, surrounded by black mulch, along with a new, timed irrigation system. Meadowlark, Livermore (cross street Olivina) see additional photos below RENTAL FEATURES - Breakfast Nook - Family Room - Master Bath - New Quartz Countertop - Hardwood Floor - All new Tile Floor - Dishwasher - Garbage Disposal - Refrigerator/Freezer - Stove/Oven - Microwave - Washer/Dryer - New Kitchen and Bath Hardware - Raised Patio - All new front/back Lawns - Sprinkler System - Fenced Yard - Mature Fruit Trees - Central A/C - Ceiling Fan - Garage - Attached NEARBY SCHOOLS - Marylin Avenue Elementary School, 0.2 mi - Livermore Valley Charter, 0.8 mi - Junction Avenue Middle School, 1.3 mi - Granada High School, 0.6 mi Please go to the Livermore Valley Joint School District website for more information: http://www.livermoreschools.com/location Private Schools: - The Athenian School, http://www.athenian.org/default.aspx - Our Savior Lutheran School, http://www.oslm.net/k8_home.php LEASE TERMS - 1 year lease. Security deposit $2,500 - Credit check of $35 for each adult occupant over 18 - Non-smoker - Total income must be 3x rent - Provide last 3 Bank statements, last 2 pay-stubs ADDITIONAL PHOTOS Family Room Family Room 2 Family Room to Nook Family Room to Patio Kitchen Quartz Top Kitchen 2 (wide-angle lens makes the kitchen look narrower) Kitchen Breakfast Area Master Bedroom Master Bath Room 2 Room 3 Hall Bath Hall Bath 2 House Front Backyard Patio Backyard Patio 2 Backyard Opposite Side Contact info: (408) 320-6446 Last Updated: June 25, 2013, 8:08am PDT

head: Conducive And beautiful one bedroom apartment for rent available now !
post: Top floor has 1 big bedroom Master is tucked away in the quietest corner of the home, is easily big enough for a king bed, has a walk-in closet, and an additional closet. The master bath is equipped with a whirlpool tub (to ease those sore muscles from a hard day at work or play) and separate shower. Front bedroom has windows looking out over open grass area. The first floor has a remodeled kitchen with Thermador Professional gas range/oven (for the budding, 5 star chef in you), bar area, dishwasher, full size refrigerator, full size pantry, recessed lights, and ample cabinet space. An extra half bath is neatly tucked away. Entry foyer opens to an open floor plan with separate living room that includes a marble fireplace and full dining area. Immaculate, refinished hardwood floors throughout complete both floors. The garage accommodates two full size automobiles, contains a washer and dryer and ample storage space. The backyard is paved flat with planting areas around the perimeter. The private backyard is great for alfresco dining/BBQs and gardening. This home is available approximately NOW Lease is 12 months - requires strong credit, first month and last months rent and security deposit.

head: $585/1br-Walnut Sq, Private Entrance Private Bath Room
post: Corner of Spruce and Rose Nice & convenient Berkeley Hills/Walnut Square neighborhood for a non-smoker and non-drinker. Quiet. No one above or below. Sunny 9X12 hardwood floor. Classic. Lots of windows. Walk-in closet with windows too. Own 5X6 redwood view deck. Own private backyard & sideyard. Laundry line outside. Near Tilden East Bay Regional Park and Rose Garden. Beautiful neighborhood walks. Commercial laundry 3 blocks away. Separate room for own fridge + microwave + George Foreman. Own private entrance and own private bath room. Walk to Petes Coffee, Sals Deli, post office, drug stores, grocery stores, Safeway and Andronico & UC Berkeley campus. 67 bus in front. Close to San Francisco bus (3 blocks away) & other variety of shops. No pets allowed. Steps. Send name, phone number & best time to call you and tell me a little about yourself to druyanday at gmail dot com. First, last + $500. Reference & Credit check required. Walk to Berkeley downtown BART station or North Berkeley BART station, easy travel to & from SFO San Francisco Airport . Add $45 for all inclusive utilities. Order your own Internet. Available July 8, 2013. Logistics: Ask to fill out a hard copy of an application form if interested. Upon completion submit together with $100 cashier check to show serious intent. Reference and credit check will be conducted. This step is to make sure who will be in the building. Every applicant goes thru this step. The check will be returned if everything does not check out. Otherwise, the $100 check will apply to first months rent. Notification within one business day. $100 is not refundable simply because there is a change of mind. It is applied to time and fees spent in processing. The key is given out after a month-to-month agreement is signed and first + last + $500 deposit is paid (of course minus the $100).

head: Luxury 3 bed / 2 full bath Condo
post: 912 Filbert St Welcome to 912 Filbert Street, a stunning Russian Hill penthouse condo. This recently remodeled property features 3 bedrooms and 2 baths, tastefully redone with the highest degree of finishes. This top floor condo showcases a beautiful chefs kitchen complete with Sub Zero refrigerator and Wolf stove and hood. 912 Filbert is the perfect home for entertaining, with the kitchen, dining, and living areas all open to each other highlighting the propertys straight-on views of Alcatraz and the Bay. With a Walkscore of 94, the condo is just steps to Union St., Hyde St., and North Beach. 2 car parking, in-unit washer and. . . dryer, and huge storage area complete this incredible condo. Dont miss!

head: Great 4 bedroom 3 bath family home
post: Great 4 bedroom 3 bath family home with two-car garage with extra storage. This beautifully maintained home is in like new condition. Hardwood floors throughout.
